justsudoku

justsudoku

GTK+/Terminal Sudoku app

Modules

  • MainHandles user input and controlling everything else.
  • Sudoku
    • Control
      • Sudoku.Control.FlagDefines flags and option descriptions.
      • Sudoku.Control.MoveDefines valid Moves and MoveErrors for Sudoku application.
      • Sudoku.Control.ParseMethods for parsing moves and for creating locations and squares.
    • Data
      • Sudoku.Data.BoardMethods and datatypes for creating and manipulating Sudoku Boards.
    • GTK
      • Sudoku.GTK.GUIMethods for creating a Sudoku GTK+ GUI.
  • Util
    • Util.OtherHopefully useful utility functions.
  • ViewWraps GUI in a module to interface with controller.

Produced by Haddock version 2.13.2
